content: Love this! A team that meshes together produces great results together. Build a great team from the very start by streamlining the hiring process and working on things that really matter, like employer branding and the candidate experience. Collaborative hiring also helps the whole team weigh in on where the company needs help and who the ideal hire would be. Read more on that here: Collaborative Hiring - Hiring Resources - RecruiteeSHAREbit.ly
